Job Title: Supervisor Supplier Quality Management

Location: Danville, IL

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Engineering, Manufacturing, Quality Assurance

Description:
Group presentationthyssenkrupp is an international group of companies comprising largely of independent industrial and technology businesses and employing 96,000 people. Across 48 countries it generated sales of €41 billion in fiscal year 2021/22. Backed by extensive technological know-how, the businesses and all employees develop cost-effective and resource-friendly solutions to the challenges of the future, especially in the fields of climate protection, the energy transition, digital transformation in the industry and mobility of the future. Under the umbrella brand thyssenkrupp, the group creates long-term value with innovative products, technologies and services and helps make life better for future generations.Company presentationThe business unit thyssenkrupp Dynamic Components is one of the leading automotive suppliers and development partners for highly complex drivetrain technologies. Around 3,500 employees produce 27 million drivetrain components a year at ten locations in Germany, Liechtenstein, Hungary, China, USA, Brazil and Mexico. The product range mainly comprises assembled camshafts, valve train systems and rotor shafts for high-end combustion, hybrid and electric engines. Further products for battery electric vehicles are already at an advanced stage of development. With our manufacturing and automation expertise, we make a significant contribution to reducing emissions for sustainable mobility.Your responsibilitiesThe Supervisor of Supplier Quality Management will perform duties in regards to the supplier quality program. This team member will be responsible to ensure supplier component quality is provided in accordance to established standards and requirements. They will ensure company supplier quality objectives are met and supplier continuous improvement programs are developed and implemented. Qualifications:Education: 4-Year Bachelor's Degree in technical field 
2 Years of Technical Experience 
2 Years Experience in Quality 
2 Years Experience in Automotive 
Supplier Quality Management experience preferred Technology: To perform this job successfully, an individual should have knowledge of Microsoft Office and Internet software; SAP; Microsoft Excel Spreadsheet and Word Processing software. Your profileKey deliverables to ensure success are listed below: Supervise the local Danville Team and the Supplier Management Team of PSMA and PPOCCoordination and train the team in PDAN, PSMA and PPOCMonitor the work results of the team in PDAN, PSMA and PPOCFunctional leadership of the commodity -powder metal USA, Mexico and Brazil.Act as Customer Representative to ensure both Customer and tkDC requirements are addressed to suppliers.Ensure on audits are conducted on time.Responsible for 8D validation at suppliersConducts APQP kick off meetings for the commodity Acts as the interface between project team and SQM Commodity, tracking of component status.Performs and supports supplier; APQP, PPAP, IMDS, change notices, and other supplier quality related activities.Facilitate supplier generated change and deviation requests

Experience Level (if available): Mid-Senior level
